      • newJob

        public static boolean newJob(String params,
                             boolean isPeriodic,
                             int period,
                             String saHash)
        It makes a general job class from the S.A.'s hash.
        Parameters:
        params - Jobs parameters.
        isPeriodic - Boolean showing if job is periodic.
        period - The period of the job if periodic.
        saHash - The S.A.'s hash.
